titles.title: To codify increases in the rates of pension for disabled veterans and surviving spouses and children that were effective as of December 1, 2009.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Disability Assistance and Memorial Affairs.

bill.summary: 6/30/2010--Introduced. Codifies under federal law increases in the rates of pension for disabled veterans and surviving spouses and children that became effective as of December 1, 2009.
